name: Border Pawtrol
description:
Penny needs some more space for her garden. Guide Wally as he resizes the fence around the critters to make room.

The gameplay is similar to Qix or Volfied where you reclaim area by drawing new border lines. Wally can bark to repel other animals and has a limited number of new lines per level.

The game currently has 4 worlds (each consisting of 4 levels and a bonus stage) plus and endless mode.

Keyboard and gamepad supported

Fullscreen only works in landscape orientation. There's still a few debug tools in the options menu.
